enabled.description: Indicates whether the contact is currently enabled or disabled.

customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer associated with the contact.

label.description: A label assigned to the contact for easy identification.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, it will be 'contact'.

send_account_email.description: Indicates whether account-related emails are enabled for the contact.

send_billing_email.description: Indicates whether billing-related emails are enabled for the contact.

custom_fields.description: Key-value pairs containing additional custom fields for the contact.
